DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to characterize the dose-related effects of delta-9-tetrahydrocannabinol (âˆ†9-THC) in healthy individuals on cerebellum-dependent motor functions.
DOC.criteria: Must have used cannabis at least once in their lifetime No cannabis use in the past month Men and women aged 21 to 35 years (extremes included) on the day of the first dosing Hearing deficits Psychiatric or mental disorders Hearing Deficits
